description: This file defines a React functional component named TopNav, which provides a top navigation bar for the application. The component displays user info, a logout button, and a toggle button (hamburger) for the sidebar. It receives props for user data, logout callback, sidebar state, and function to toggle sidebar visibility.

methods.name: TopNav({ user, onLogout, sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen })
methods.description: Functional React component rendering the top navigation bar with user info, logout, and sidebar toggle buttons.
